name: TELEGRAPH SUDOKU & KAKURO
description:
Play number-puzzles from 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before! Discover a whopping 500 puzzles spread amongst multiple type of number-puzzle. Many hours of gameplay!

- Sudoku:
classic 9x9 Sudoku grids coming into 4 levels of difficulty.
- Mini-Sudoku:
easier 6x6 grids.
- Sudoku-X:
9x9 grids in which the diagonals must also be filled with all numbers from 1 to 9.
- Jigsaw Sudoku:
9x9 grids with uncommon box shapes.

- Kakuro
You're in for many hours of gameplay! With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game trasfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience. Notable features include:
- Registration of best times in the Hall of Fame.
- Interactive hints prevent you from being stuck!
- Autosave as you go: you can stop and resume a puzzle at any time!
